name: MARINA
description:
Marina is a game about marine pollution and how it affects sea creatures.

It shows this in a playful and colorful way with the example of a turtle we named Marina, who has to survive and grow to her adult size.

After hatching she has to make it through a dirty beach, and get to the sea. The challenge isn't over when she finally reaches the water. Both human and animal predators are trying to get their hands on her, all the while she has to forage for food.
